**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance of Might Registers**

**Title:** *The Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance of Might Registers*
Author unknown, approximately dating to the Northern and Southern Dynasties, belonging to the early Celestial Master Dao registers. One scroll.
Source of base text: *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Unity Section, First Subsection.

---

**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance of Might Registers**

The Register of the Supreme One Office Divine Lads,
The Register of the Supreme Ten Office Divine Lads,
The Register of the Supreme Seventy-Five Office Divine Lads,
The Register of the Supreme Three-Five Red Officials for Slaying Demons,
The Register of the Great Unity Protector-General of the Body,
The Register of the Supreme Twenty-Four Governances’ Qi,
The Register of the Supreme Protection of the Body, Prolonging Life, and Resolving All Calamities,
The Register of the Supreme Preservation of Life and Longevity,
The Supreme Phoenix Register for Dispelling Defilement,
The Supreme Three-Five Precious Register for Resolving Harm,
The Register of Lord Lao Bestowing upon Xu Jia for Prolonging Life and Preserving Destiny,
The Supreme Register for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasures,
The Supreme Nine-One River Chart Precious Register,
The Supreme Register of One Hundred Fifty Generals and Male Immortals.

---

**The Register of the Supreme One Office Divine Lads**

On such-and-such a year, month, and day, in such-and-such a prefecture, county, village, and abbey, so-and-so of such-and-such a register, having long borne the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the Supreme August Emperor Wang, within their person yet unable to distinguish it themselves, now presents their sincerity to the Master of the Three Caverns, your subject so-and-so, to receive the *Register of the Supreme One Office Divine Lads*. They truthfully declare: having been summoned by the Lord, from this day forth, upon receiving their appointment, they must assist the Celestial Master in healing the illnesses of the people. They shall not lightly divulge secrets, commit licentiousness or theft, harbor resentment, deceit, or jealousy, nor engage in improper conduct. Should they act independently or slander their master, they shall incur the envy of demonic spirits. They must only cultivate kindness, nurture filial piety, respect the elderly, cherish the young, and mutually support their parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the year and the sacred days of the five seasonal festivals, they shall offer prayers in the hall for their nine generations of ancestors. On the same day in the second and eighth months, they shall sacrifice to the earth god and the stove god. They shall not privately worship other spirits or gods. Should they violate these precepts even once, they shall suffer harm and injury, bearing no grudge against the Dao or blame toward their master. All shall be as the statutes command.

Two Merit Officers of the Northern First Upper Office,
One Hundred Twenty Tiger-Rushing Clerks of the Northern First Upper Office.

One Hundred Twenty Crimson Celestial Banner Left and Right Generals.

**Recommendation, Supervision, and Ordination:**
Register of the Ten Offices Divine Lads of the Most High
On the _day/month/year_, at the _Palace/Abbey_ of _prefecture/county/township_, the disciple of _surname_, having received the register of the _Dharma Register_, declares:
Imbued with the divine qi of the newly manifested Lord Lao, the Most High August Emperor-King, yet unable to discern it myself, I now present this token of faith to the Three Caverns Dharma Master, your servant, to humbly request the register of the Ten Offices Divine Lads of the Most High.
I truly affirm and declare that, upon being summoned and enrolled henceforth, I shall cultivate kindness, nurture filial piety, respect the elderly, cherish the young, and mutually support my parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the year and the sacred days of the five seasonal festivals, I shall offer prayers in the hall for my nine generations of ancestors. On the same day in the second and eighth months, I shall sacrifice to the earth god and the stove god. I shall not privately worship other spirits or gods. Should I violate these precepts even once, I shall suffer harm and injury, bearing no grudge against the Dao or blame toward my master. All shall be as the statutes of the Most High Lord Lao command.

Ordination Master of the Register of the Seventy-Five Offices of the Celestial Youths

On the _day_ of the _month_ of the _year_, [name], of [prefecture], [county], [township], and [village], from [Daoist abbey/temple], having received the Register of the [specific] Daoist Ordination, bearing the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the Supreme August Emperor Wang, newly infused within the body, yet unable to distinguish it clearly, now presents credentials and approaches the Three Caverns’ Dharma Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Register of the Seventy-Five Offices of the Celestial Youths*. All statements herein are true and complete. Upon being summoned by the Lord, [the recipient] shall, from this day forward, be assigned duties in accordance with the following precepts:

To cultivate compassion and filial piety, to revere the aged and cherish the young, and to ensure mutual care among parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the Five La Festivals, offerings shall be made in the hall to the nine generations of ancestral parents. On the same day in the second and eighth months, sacrifices shall be made to the Earth God and the Hearth God. No private worship of other spirits or deities is permitted. Should any violation occur, harm shall befall the transgressor, who shall not blame the Dao or fault the master. All is in accordance with the statutes and decrees of the Most High Lord Lao.

On the [day] of [month] in the [year], [name], of [prefecture], [county], [township], and [village], a Daoist of [temple/monastery], having received the precepts of [specific method], bearing the surname [name], has long been infused with the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the Supreme August Emperor Wang. Unable to distinguish it himself, he now presents his credentials to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *San Wu Chi Guan Zhan Xie Zhi Bing*, to stabilize the Three Hun and settle the Seven Po. Following above and below, accompanying all movements in and out, they repel and expel all malevolent forces, capture and extinguish spirits and anomalies—be they river turtles, alligators, tortoises, soft-shelled turtles, foxes, ancient specters, thousand-year-old demons, dominant or recessive malign influences, or any hostile residual qi—preventing them from rashly violating the disciple’s person. All is done in accordance with the statutes and commands of the Most High Lord Lao.

Ordination Master of the Supreme Lord’s Body-Protecting General Register:

On the ___ day of the ___ month of the ___ year, at ___ Palace/Abbey in ___ Prefecture, ___ County, ___ Township, the disciple of the ___ Register, surnamed ___, whose body has long been infused with the divine qi of the newly manifested Lord Lao, the Supreme High Emperor Wang, yet unable to distinguish it, now presents this token of faith to the Three Caverns’ Dharma Master, your servant ___, to receive the Divine Talisman and Register of the Grand One’s Body-Protecting General. Upon investiture, the true spirits of the Grand One, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans, and a thousand chariots with ten thousand cavalry shall follow the disciple’s person, warding off calamities and ensuring enduring existence.

Henceforth, the disciple must diligently revere the Dharma and uphold the Great Dao, never lightly divulging the sacred writ. All shall be as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao.

Majestic is the August Heaven, sheltering the disciple’s body;
Profound is the August Earth, bearing the disciple without obstruction.
Unassisted, the disciple walks; unguided, the path unfolds.
Sun and moon alike illuminate, dispelling the Five Misfortunes.
Holy spirits nurture, granting sweet nectar to partake.
The King Father remembers, bestowing immortal recipes;
The Queen Mother remembers, prolonging life and adding years.
The Jade Maidens remember, burning the Five Fragrances;
The Perfected remember, greeting with laughter and speech.
Upon meeting the Warrior Spirits, blades are blunted and points broken;
Upon meeting the Valiant Guardians, no treacherous one dares stand.
Bridges are crossed instantly; waters cease to flow.
In mountains and forests, all paths are cleared and obstacles repelled.
The Five Weapons, ghostly thieves, flee and hide their heads.
Wherever the disciple travels, all is unimpeded;
Wherever the disciple rests, all is at peace.
Abiding by the precepts and receiving this register,
ascension to immortality is swiftly attained.

Hasten! All as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao.

**Impurities Dissolved**
Azure impurities of the East, vermilion impurities of the South, yellow impurities of the Center, white impurities of the West, black impurities of the North—impurities of the Five Directions and Five Colors. Impurities of Heaven, impurities of Earth, impurities of humans, impurities of ghosts, impurities of oxen, horses, and the six livestock. From turbid, repent to clarity; from death, hinder not life. From this day forth, dissolve all impurities, that I may attain long life.

**Ordination Masters**
*Tai Shang San Wu* Precious Talismanic Register for Dissolving Obstructions, *Tai Xuan Zhong Yi* Golden Gate Precious Talismanic Register of the True Standard—these were the profound inner teachings of the Queen Mother of the West, bestowed by the August Jade Emperor in the Purple Tenuity Palace. They contain the salvific ordinances, descending to transform the world in each age, to deliver and liberate living beings, to dissolve and dispel obstructions to life and destiny.

For those afflicted by the Three Punishments or Four Executions, solitary hours or widowed constellations, celestial slayings or terrestrial slayings, the yearly star of Heaven’s span, the Primordial Hour’s Six Harms; for those whose children, parents, or kin have perished utterly, entering the tomb’s embrace, and who thereby suffer mutual obstruction—today, they receive the Great Register for Dissolving Obstructions, to guard the body and protect life, to extend years and augment longevity, to harmonize fate and destiny. All that is fated to be overcome shall be wholly dispersed; harmony shall prevail among the six relations, and compassion nurture the nine kinships. Parents, siblings, and the ancestral lineage shall receive this transmission in the body, forever preserving long life, in perfect accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Most High Lord Lao.

**Initiation Master**
The Most High Lord Lao bestows upon Xu Jia the *Register for Extending Life and Preserving Destiny*. This is the sacred writ of the Supreme Primordial Qi of the Jade Sovereign, the August Highest Lord, the True Lord who determines lifespan, extends years, and grants enduring vision, safeguarding the body and protecting life. It is a numinous text of profound mystery, not to be handled by the common. Formerly, Master Yin Xi, Magistrate of the Hangu Pass, personally received its transmission and bequeathed it to later worthies. Only the true disciples of immortals—those whose bones and destiny align with the Dao—may reverently bear this writ.

In the first year of the Yuanshou era, Dongfang Shuo, the transcendent son of the Eastern August Void Sovereign, journeyed to the Queen Mother of the West with a thousand days’ pure offering to beseech this method. Upon wearing it, he attained the true Dao, as Xu Jia had before him, gaining a thousand additional years. Zhang Daoling wore it and ascended to heaven in broad daylight. Zhao Sheng, through cultivation, swiftly realized perfection. Should the disciple of the Correct and True be able to follow its statutes and receive it with devotion, they too shall extend their years, prolong their vision, lengthen their lifespan, and augment their allotted time. The body shall be safeguarded, life preserved, a thousand calamities averted, and ten thousand harms dissolved. The jade lads and jade maidens of the Dharma, the celestial officials, generals, and clerks, the Heavenly Ding warriors, the lifespan-determining forces, the talisman-empowered Generals of Extended Lifespan, and their myriad hosts—each in their millions—shall ever attend the bearer, never parting from their person.

Should one uphold and cultivate this method, they shall attain long life, enduring vision, transcendence of life and death, and realization of the Dao. This method is secret and wondrous; it must not be transmitted to the unworthy. Should transmission violate its statutes, misfortune shall extend to the seven ancestors and afflict the recipient’s own body. Let none blame the master or fault the Dao.

**By the Statutes and Ordinances of the Most High Lord Lao:**
The Primordial Qi of the Mysterious Origin determines lifespan, extends years, grants enduring vision, safeguards the body, and protects life. Through transformation, one ascends as an immortal. The precious talisman and register summon the Generals of Allotted Lifespan, the clerks and warriors of fixed destiny, the transcendent lads of extended years, and the jade maidens of preserved lifespan—each in their millions—to encircle the bearer’s bones, shield their person, and guard their movements, whether walking, standing, sitting, or reclining, near or far, never parting. Should one receive, wear, and cultivate it, they may ascend as an immortal.

**On the Zi day at the Zi hour (11 PM–1 AM),** the *Register for Extending Life and Preserving Destiny* summons the Determining Lads and Jade Maidens, each ninety million strong.
**On the Chou day at the Chou hour (1–3 AM),** it summons the Lifespan-Fixing Transcendent Officials, each ninety million strong.
**On the Yin day at the Yin hour (3–5 AM),** it summons the Earth Officials of Fixed Form, each ninety million strong.
**On the Mao day at the Mao hour (5–7 AM),** it summons the Water Officials of Death’s Dissolution, each ninety million strong.
**On the Chen day at the Chen hour (7–9 AM),** it summons the Eastern Dipper Lords of Recorded Lifespan, each ninety million strong.
**On the Si day at the Si hour (9–11 AM),** it summons the Southern Dipper Lords of Ascendant Life, each ninety million strong.
**On the Wu day at the Wu hour (11 AM–1 PM),** it summons the Western Dipper Lords of Recorded Names, each ninety million strong.
**On the Wei day at the Wei hour (1–3 PM),** it summons the Northern Dipper Lords of Fallen Death, each ninety million strong.
**On the Shen day at the Shen hour (3–5 PM),** it summons the Central Dipper Lords of the Great Culmen, each ninety million strong.
**On the You day at the You hour (5–7 PM),** it summons the Three Terraces Lords of Long Life, each ninety million strong.
**On the Xu day at the Xu hour (7–9 PM),** it summons the Twenty-Eight Constellations Lords of Disaster’s Dissolution, each ninety million strong.
**On the Hai day at the Hai hour (9–11 PM),** it summons the Thirty-Five Stars Lords of Sin’s Eradication, each ninety million strong.

**By the Supreme Primordial, the Most High, the Three Heavens, the Boundless Great Dao, the Most High Lord Lao:**
Your servant, though born of mortal flesh with dull senses and clouded perception, now presents offerings of sincerity to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Register of Lord Lao for Determining Lifespan, Extending Years, and Preserving Destiny*, to be cherished as a lifelong treasure. May the immortals and sages respond in kind. After receiving and wearing it, one must not treat the scriptures with disdain, mock Daoist priests, envy the worthy, resent the capable, bully the weak, or seize what is not rightfully theirs. Should one uphold it without transgression, it may be transmitted after ten years.

**Endorsement**
**Supervision**

**Initiation Master: The Supreme Wondrous Register for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasure**

Lord Lao declares: The *Register of the Purple Tenuity Jade Emperor Dao Lord for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasure* is the esoteric script of the Azure Youth Lord of the Eastern Sea. Its numinous writ was once hidden, unseen by mortals, until the Yellow Emperor, on Mount Tai Bai, personally received it from the Queen Mother of the West and the Mysterious Woman. Thereby he attained wealth and nobility and ascended as an immortal. The Jade Cauldron Immortal transmitted it to the world, yet those without predestined fortune may neither hear nor behold this text. This precious register summons gold and calls forth silver, multiplying coin and silk daily. The five grains overflow, servants and maidservants thrive, fields and silkworms yield double harvests, merchants profit, and trade returns manifold. Wealth departs but returns again, safeguarding the household. Bandits and raiders inflict no harm; wicked villains and evil schemers turn toward compassion. Those who receive and cultivate it shall see their household prosper, their sons loyal and daughters chaste, their years prolonged and lives extended, their blessings shading descendants. Official emoluments increase daily, service to the sovereign brings fulfillment, and all hold them in love and reverence. Journeys near and far meet no obstruction; public and private affairs command respect. Ten thousand evils do not approach. Dragons, snakes, tigers, and beasts retreat and hide. The five pestilences and plague demons flee a thousand *li* away. This register is a treasure of secrecy—do not transmit it to the unworthy. If you can uphold it, guard it well.

Lord Lao declares: The *Purple Tenuity Central Harmony Wealth-Summoning Spirit Talisman*—regularly inscribed in cinnabar on the days of *bingzi*, *dingsi*, *renyin*, *guimao*, *wushen*, and *wuwu* (when the moon is full, waning, or waxing)—when worn, summons wealth from the five directions, bestowing riches and nobility. Trade flourishes a myriadfold, and commerce yields manifold returns. The talisman’s spirit hosts—nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine in number—attend and guard the bearer.

Lord Lao declares: The *Purple Tenuity Central Harmony Treasure-Securing Spirit Talisman*, inscribed in cinnabar on the aforementioned six prosperous days and worn—men on the left, women on the right—grants all desires as the heart wishes. Wealth and coin abound, livestock multiply, fields and silkworms thrive, and both public and private affairs command respect. Ten thousand calamities do not befall. The talisman’s spirit officers and soldiers—nine thousand nine hundred in number—attend and guard the disciple’s body.

Lord Lao declares: The *Purple Tenuity Central Harmony Prosperity-Bestowing Spirit Talisman*, inscribed on the six prosperous days and worn, brings prosperity and seeks profit, fulfilling all desires as the heart wishes. Ever pure and upright, the bearer of this spirit talisman remains untouched by the ten thousand illnesses, and wealth multiplies manifold. The talisman’s spirit officers and soldiers—three thousand nine hundred and ninety in number—protect the recipient’s body.

**The Supreme Clarity summons:**
The celestial treasury’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The terrestrial treasury’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The eastern treasury of the *Jiao* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The southern treasury of the *Zheng* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The western treasury of the *Shang* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The northern treasury of the *Yu* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The central treasury of the *Gong* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The great wealthy elders of the one hundred twenty commanderies of the nine provinces—gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.

On the [day] of [month] in the [year], in the [prefecture], [county], [village], and [hamlet], at the [abbey/temple], the disciple [name], bearing the newly manifested divine qi of Lord Lao, the Supreme High Emperor King, unable to discern for themselves, now presents offerings of sincerity to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Supreme Lord Lao’s Wondrous Register for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasure*, to cultivate and venerate as a lifelong treasure. After receiving the register, one must not defy Heaven above, betray Earth below, or slight one’s master in between. One must not disdain the Dharma, bully the orphaned or weak, despise the elderly, or favor the young. Should one violate these precepts even once, their lifespan shall be reduced by nine years. If upheld without transgression, it may be transmitted after ten years. All is in accordance with the covenant and statutes of the Supreme Lord Lao.

**Endorsement**
**Supervision**

**Initiation Master**
*The Precious Register of the Nine-One River Chart*

On the [day] of [month] in the [year], [name], of [prefecture, county, village], having received the [name] Register at [name] Abbey, bearing the newly manifested divine qi of the Supreme High Emperor King Lord Lao within, yet unable to discern its mysteries, now presents offerings of sincerity to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Supreme Lord’s Nine-One River Chart: Primal Record of the Nine Sovereigns’ Hidden Names and the Formula for Eternal Life*. May the Nine Palaces’ numinous officials descend to guard the disciple’s body, repelling evil and embracing rectitude, to assemble together before the Jade Emperor. All is in accordance with the statutes of the Supreme Lord Lao.

**First:** The Yang Brightness Star, Jade Emperor of the Nine Celestial Lords, the hun-soul of the Celestial Pivot Star, paired with the Perfected August Consort of the Western Gate.
**Second:** The Yin Essence Star, Jade Emperor of the Flowery Celestial Lord, the hun-soul of the Celestial Rotation Star, paired with the Transcendent August Consort of the Northwest Gate.
**Third:** The Perfected Person Star, Jade Emperor of the Transcendent Celestial Lord, the hun-soul of the Celestial Mechanism Star, paired with the Radiant August Consort of the Eastern Gate.
**Fourth:** The Profound Darkness Star, Jade Emperor of the Soaring Canopy Lord, the hun-soul of the Celestial Balance Star, paired with the Flourishing August Consort of the Southern Gate.
**Fifth:** The Cinnabar Prime Lord, Jade Emperor of the Golden Spirit Seven Celestial Lords, the numinous essence of the Celestial Judgment Star, paired with the Central August Consort of the Northern Gate.
**Sixth:** The Northern Culmen Star, Jade Emperor of the Northern Culmen Flowery Lord, the hun-soul of the Northern Culmen Star, paired with the Primal August Consort of the Northern Culmen Gate.
**Seventh:** The Celestial Pass Star, Jade Emperor of the Compassionate Numinous Northern Canopy Lord, the hun-soul of the Twinkling Brilliance Star, paired with the Void August Consort beneath the Two Gates of Great Brilliance at the Northern Gate.
**Eighth:** The Left Auxiliary Star, Jade Emperor of the August Nine Celestial Lords, the hun-soul of the Luminous Cavern Star, paired with the Imperial August Consort of the Essence Yang Brightness at the Western Gate.
**Ninth:** The Right Assistant Star, Jade Emperor of the August Primal Celestial Lord, the essence-soul of the Hidden Prime Star, paired with the August Consort of the Southeastern Gate.

**Nine Palaces’ Appropriate Arrangements**
**Yang Brightness Grand Commandery:** Nine hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Yin Essence Supreme Ministry:** Five hundred fifty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Perfected Person Minister of Works:** Seven hundred seventy ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Profound Darkness Mobile Strike Commandery:** Eight hundred eighty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Cinnabar Prime Dipper Lord’s Palace:** Seven hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Northern Culmen Grand Constancy Palace:** Seven hundred seventy ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Celestial Pass Supreme Emperor’s Palace:** Seven hundred seventy ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Auxiliary Heavenly August Jade Emperor’s Palace:** Nine hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Assistant Great Emperor’s Perfected Palace:** Nine hundred ninety ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.

**Endorsement**
**Supervision**

**Initiation Master**
**One Hundred Fifty Generals of the Male Immortals’ Numinous Register:**
In the such-and-such year, such-and-such month, such-and-such day, [disciple] of such-and-such prefecture, county, village, and hamlet, having received the such-and-such Dharma Register at such-and-such abbey or oratory, bearing the surname so-and-so, has long been infused with the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the August High Emperor Wang. Unable to distinguish this for himself, he now presents his credentials to the Three Caverns’ Dharma Master, your servant so-and-so, to request the *Numinous Register of the One Hundred Fifty Generals of the Male Immortals*. He truthfully declares in full: once summoned by the Lord and appointed from this day forth, he must assist the Celestial Master in healing the people. He shall not drink wine, eat meat, indulge in licentiousness, steal, harbor resentment, or bear malice. He shall not engage in improper conduct, establish his own methods, or mock his master. Such are the deeds that demons and ghosts abhor. Instead, he shall cultivate kindness and nurture filial piety, respect the elderly and cherish the young, and ensure mutual support among parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the year and the five seasonal festivals, he shall worship his ancestral kin and the Great Ancestor in the hall. On the same days of the second and eighth months, he shall offer sacrifices to the earth gods and the hearth. He shall not privately worship other spirits or ghosts. Should he violate these precepts even once, he will suffer immediate harm, bearing no grudge against the Dao or faulting his master. All is in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Most High Lord Lao.

First: Refrain from killing; contemplate the lives of all beings.
Second: Refrain from lustful conduct or illicit relations.

Fifth: Refrain from intoxication; always contemplate pure conduct.

**End of the Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance-Wei Rites, as attested by the Sponsor, the Supervising Ordainer, and the Ordination Master.**

chunks.original_text: 太上正一盟威法箓 经名：太上正一盟威法箓。 撰人不详，约出於南北朝，系早期天师道法箓。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 太上正一盟威法箓 太上一官童子箓， 太上十官童子箓， 太上七十五官童子箓， 太上三五赤官斩邪箓， 太一护身将军箓， 太上二十四治气箓， 太上护身延年解一切灾厄箓， 太上保命长生箓， 太上凤凰解秽妙箓， 太上三五解妨害宝符妙箓， 太上老君授徐甲延生保命箓， 太上招财镇宝妙箓， 太上九一河图宝箓， 太上百五十将军男仙灵箓。 太上一官童子箓 维某年某月某日，某州县乡里，某宫观受某法箓姓某，素被新出老君太上高皇帝王神气在身，不能自分别，今赍信诣三洞法师臣某，请受太上一官童子箓，自实悉言，被君召，即日听署之后，要当扶助天师医治百姓疾病，不得轻泄淫盗，鬲戾妬，行不正之事，自作一法，诽笑师主者，此魔鬼所嫉，但当慈仁育孝，敬老爱少，父母兄弟，更相承奉，常以五腊吉日於堂上祝家亲九祖，二月八月同日祀社灶，其余不得私祀他鬼神，一旦违犯，坐见中伤，不得怨道咎师，一如律令。 北一上官直使功曹二人， 北一上官郎吏虎贲百二十人，
chunks.translated_text:
**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance of Might Registers**

**Title:** *The Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance of Might Registers*
Author unknown, approximately dating to the Northern and Southern Dynasties, belonging to the early Celestial Master Dao registers. One scroll.
Source of base text: *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Unity Section, First Subsection.

---

**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Alliance of Might Registers**

The Register of the Supreme One Office Divine Lads,
The Register of the Supreme Ten Office Divine Lads,
The Register of the Supreme Seventy-Five Office Divine Lads,
The Register of the Supreme Three-Five Red Officials for Slaying Demons,
The Register of the Great Unity Protector-General of the Body,
The Register of the Supreme Twenty-Four Governances’ Qi,
The Register of the Supreme Protection of the Body, Prolonging Life, and Resolving All Calamities,
The Register of the Supreme Preservation of Life and Longevity,
The Supreme Phoenix Register for Dispelling Defilement,
The Supreme Three-Five Precious Register for Resolving Harm,
The Register of Lord Lao Bestowing upon Xu Jia for Prolonging Life and Preserving Destiny,
The Supreme Register for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasures,
The Supreme Nine-One River Chart Precious Register,
The Supreme Register of One Hundred Fifty Generals and Male Immortals.

---

**The Register of the Supreme One Office Divine Lads**

On such-and-such a year, month, and day, in such-and-such a prefecture, county, village, and abbey, so-and-so of such-and-such a register, having long borne the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the Supreme August Emperor Wang, within their person yet unable to distinguish it themselves, now presents their sincerity to the Master of the Three Caverns, your subject so-and-so, to receive the *Register of the Supreme One Office Divine Lads*. They truthfully declare: having been summoned by the Lord, from this day forth, upon receiving their appointment, they must assist the Celestial Master in healing the illnesses of the people. They shall not lightly divulge secrets, commit licentiousness or theft, harbor resentment, deceit, or jealousy, nor engage in improper conduct. Should they act independently or slander their master, they shall incur the envy of demonic spirits. They must only cultivate kindness, nurture filial piety, respect the elderly, cherish the young, and mutually support their parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the year and the sacred days of the five seasonal festivals, they shall offer prayers in the hall for their nine generations of ancestors. On the same day in the second and eighth months, they shall sacrifice to the earth god and the stove god. They shall not privately worship other spirits or gods. Should they violate these precepts even once, they shall suffer harm and injury, bearing no grudge against the Dao or blame toward their master. All shall be as the statutes command.

Two Merit Officers of the Northern First Upper Office,
One Hundred Twenty Tiger-Rushing Clerks of the Northern First Upper Office.

**Recommendation, Supervision, and Ordination:**
Register of the Ten Offices Divine Lads of the Most High
On the _day/month/year_, at the _Palace/Abbey_ of _prefecture/county/township_, the disciple of _surname_, having received the register of the _Dharma Register_, declares:
Imbued with the divine qi of the newly manifested Lord Lao, the Most High August Emperor-King, yet unable to discern it myself, I now present this token of faith to the Three Caverns Dharma Master, your servant, to humbly request the register of the Ten Offices Divine Lads of the Most High.
I truly affirm and declare that, upon being summoned and enrolled henceforth, I shall cultivate kindness, nurture filial piety, respect the elderly, cherish the young, and mutually support my parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the year and the sacred days of the five seasonal festivals, I shall offer prayers in the hall for my nine generations of ancestors. On the same day in the second and eighth months, I shall sacrifice to the earth god and the stove god. I shall not privately worship other spirits or gods. Should I violate these precepts even once, I shall suffer harm and injury, bearing no grudge against the Dao or blame toward my master. All shall be as the statutes of the Most High Lord Lao command.

On the _day_ of the _month_ of the _year_, [name], of [prefecture], [county], [township], and [village], from [Daoist abbey/temple], having received the Register of the [specific] Daoist Ordination, bearing the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the Supreme August Emperor Wang, newly infused within the body, yet unable to distinguish it clearly, now presents credentials and approaches the Three Caverns’ Dharma Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Register of the Seventy-Five Offices of the Celestial Youths*. All statements herein are true and complete. Upon being summoned by the Lord, [the recipient] shall, from this day forward, be assigned duties in accordance with the following precepts:

To cultivate compassion and filial piety, to revere the aged and cherish the young, and to ensure mutual care among parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the Five La Festivals, offerings shall be made in the hall to the nine generations of ancestral parents. chunks.original_text: 度师 太上护身将军箓 维某年某月某日，某州县乡里，某宫观受某法箓姓某，素被新出老君太上高皇帝王神气在身，不能自分别，今赍信诣三洞法师臣某，请受太一护身将军神符箓，受任之后，太一真神五帝直符千乘万骑随逐弟子之身，度厄长存，当勤心敬法，尊崇大道，不得轻泄神文，一如太上老君律令。 皇天堂堂，覆弟子身，皇地厚载，弟子不开自通，不扶自行，日月同照，辟除五殃，圣神养育，坐食甘浆，王父相念，奉致仙方，王母相念，延年益寿，玉女相念，焚烧五香，真人相念，语笑相迎，兵人相见，摧折锋铓，力士相见，奸人敢当，桥梁即渡，水为不流，山林进止，辟斥道途，五兵鬼贼，逃避要头，行无不通，止无不休，依科奉受，立得仙度，急急一如太上老君律令。 保举 监度
chunks.translated_text:
Ordination Master of the Supreme Lord’s Body-Protecting General Register:

On the ___ day of the ___ month of the ___ year, at ___ Palace/Abbey in ___ Prefecture, ___ County, ___ Township, the disciple of the ___ Register, surnamed ___, whose body has long been infused with the divine qi of the newly manifested Lord Lao, the Supreme High Emperor Wang, yet unable to distinguish it, now presents this token of faith to the Three Caverns’ Dharma Master, your servant ___, to receive the Divine Talisman and Register of the Grand One’s Body-Protecting General. Upon investiture, the true spirits of the Grand One, the Five Thearchs’ direct talismans, and a thousand chariots with ten thousand cavalry shall follow the disciple’s person, warding off calamities and ensuring enduring existence.

Henceforth, the disciple must diligently revere the Dharma and uphold the Great Dao, never lightly divulging the sacred writ. All shall be as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao.

Majestic is the August Heaven, sheltering the disciple’s body;
Profound is the August Earth, bearing the disciple without obstruction.
Unassisted, the disciple walks; unguided, the path unfolds.
Sun and moon alike illuminate, dispelling the Five Misfortunes.
Holy spirits nurture, granting sweet nectar to partake.
The King Father remembers, bestowing immortal recipes;
The Queen Mother remembers, prolonging life and adding years.
The Jade Maidens remember, burning the Five Fragrances;
The Perfected remember, greeting with laughter and speech.
Upon meeting the Warrior Spirits, blades are blunted and points broken;
Upon meeting the Valiant Guardians, no treacherous one dares stand.
Bridges are crossed instantly; waters cease to flow.
In mountains and forests, all paths are cleared and obstacles repelled.
The Five Weapons, ghostly thieves, flee and hide their heads.
Wherever the disciple travels, all is unimpeded;
Wherever the disciple rests, all is at peace.
Abiding by the precepts and receiving this register,
ascension to immortality is swiftly attained.

Hasten! All as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao.

Guarantors and Supervisors of Ordination.

They contain the salvific ordinances, descending to transform the world in each age, to deliver and liberate living beings, to dissolve and dispel obstructions to life and destiny.

chunks.original_text: 度师 太上老君授徐甲延生保命箓 无上玄元始气玉皇高尊上帝真君生算定寿，延年久视，保身护命，要圣灵文也 ，且玄科秘隐非凡所行，昔函谷关令尹喜先生，亲承旨授传流下世，宣於后贤，其有真仙之子，骨命合道者，可得奉佩此文，昔元狩元年，有东陵虚皇之子东方朔，亲诣西王母清赍千日，祈请此法持佩在身，得获真道徐甲授之，增算千年，张道陵佩之，白日升天，赵升修行便证，正真子能依科奉受修持，即得延年久视，长生增算益年，保身护命，辟除千灾，消灭万害，护法玉童玉女，天官君将吏兵，天丁力士定算，直符益算将军等，各千万众，随逐佩法者，身永不相离，子能奉持长生久视，生死获道，斯法秘妙，非真勿传，传授不依科限，殃及七祖，逮兆生身，不得怨师咎道，一如太上老君律令。 老君曰：玄元始气，生算定寿，延年久视保身护命，长生升仙变化，宝符摄录，生算将军，定算吏兵，益算仙童，保算玉女等，各千万众，随逐佩箓者，身行住坐卧，出入远近，缠身绕骨，防护营卫，永不相离，子能奉受，持佩修行，可以登仙。 · 太清子日子时，生算延年久视，保身护命，定童王女各九千万人。 太清丑日丑时，生算延年久视，保身护命，定寿仙官各九千万人。 太清寅日寅时，生算延年久视，保身护命，定体地官九千万人。 太清卯日卯时，生算延年久视，保身护命，除死水官九千万人。 太清辰日辰时，生算延年久视，保身护命，东斗注算君九千万人。 太清巳日巳时，生算延年久视，保身护命，南斗上生君九千万人。 太清午日午时，生算延年久视，保身护命，西斗记名君九千万人。 太清未日未时，生算延年久视，保身护命，北斗落死君九千万人。 太清申日申时，生算延年久视，保身护命，中斗大魁君九千万人。 太清酉日酉时，生筹延年久视，保身护命，三台长生君九千万人。 太清戌日戌时，生算延年久视，保身护命，二十八宿消灾君九千万人。 太清亥日亥时，生筹延年久视，保身护命，三十五星除罪君九千万人。 太清玄元无上三天无极大道太上老君门下，臣胎生凡短，耳目不明，昔以云云。 维某年某月某日，某州县乡里，某宫观受某法箓姓某，素被新出老君太上高皇帝王神气在身，不能自分别，今赍信诣三洞法师臣某，请受老君生算定寿，久视保身护命，永为身宝，仙圣感应，奉佩之后，不得轻慢经文，诽笑道士，妬贤嫉能，欺凌寡弱，抑夺不平，行之不犯，十年可传。 保举 监度
chunks.translated_text:
**Initiation Master**
The Most High Lord Lao bestows upon Xu Jia the *Register for Extending Life and Preserving Destiny*. This is the sacred writ of the Supreme Primordial Qi of the Jade Sovereign, the August Highest Lord, the True Lord who determines lifespan, extends years, and grants enduring vision, safeguarding the body and protecting life. It is a numinous text of profound mystery, not to be handled by the common. Formerly, Master Yin Xi, Magistrate of the Hangu Pass, personally received its transmission and bequeathed it to later worthies. Only the true disciples of immortals—those whose bones and destiny align with the Dao—may reverently bear this writ.

In the first year of the Yuanshou era, Dongfang Shuo, the transcendent son of the Eastern August Void Sovereign, journeyed to the Queen Mother of the West with a thousand days’ pure offering to beseech this method. Upon wearing it, he attained the true Dao, as Xu Jia had before him, gaining a thousand additional years. Zhang Daoling wore it and ascended to heaven in broad daylight. Zhao Sheng, through cultivation, swiftly realized perfection. Should the disciple of the Correct and True be able to follow its statutes and receive it with devotion, they too shall extend their years, prolong their vision, lengthen their lifespan, and augment their allotted time. The body shall be safeguarded, life preserved, a thousand calamities averted, and ten thousand harms dissolved. The jade lads and jade maidens of the Dharma, the celestial officials, generals, and clerks, the Heavenly Ding warriors, the lifespan-determining forces, the talisman-empowered Generals of Extended Lifespan, and their myriad hosts—each in their millions—shall ever attend the bearer, never parting from their person.

Should one uphold and cultivate this method, they shall attain long life, enduring vision, transcendence of life and death, and realization of the Dao. This method is secret and wondrous; it must not be transmitted to the unworthy. Should transmission violate its statutes, misfortune shall extend to the seven ancestors and afflict the recipient’s own body. Let none blame the master or fault the Dao.

**By the Statutes and Ordinances of the Most High Lord Lao:**
The Primordial Qi of the Mysterious Origin determines lifespan, extends years, grants enduring vision, safeguards the body, and protects life. Through transformation, one ascends as an immortal. The precious talisman and register summon the Generals of Allotted Lifespan, the clerks and warriors of fixed destiny, the transcendent lads of extended years, and the jade maidens of preserved lifespan—each in their millions—to encircle the bearer’s bones, shield their person, and guard their movements, whether walking, standing, sitting, or reclining, near or far, never parting. Should one receive, wear, and cultivate it, they may ascend as an immortal.

**On the Zi day at the Zi hour (11 PM–1 AM),** the *Register for Extending Life and Preserving Destiny* summons the Determining Lads and Jade Maidens, each ninety million strong.
**On the Chou day at the Chou hour (1–3 AM),** it summons the Lifespan-Fixing Transcendent Officials, each ninety million strong.
**On the Yin day at the Yin hour (3–5 AM),** it summons the Earth Officials of Fixed Form, each ninety million strong.
**On the Mao day at the Mao hour (5–7 AM),** it summons the Water Officials of Death’s Dissolution, each ninety million strong.
**On the Chen day at the Chen hour (7–9 AM),** it summons the Eastern Dipper Lords of Recorded Lifespan, each ninety million strong.
**On the Si day at the Si hour (9–11 AM),** it summons the Southern Dipper Lords of Ascendant Life, each ninety million strong.
**On the Wu day at the Wu hour (11 AM–1 PM),** it summons the Western Dipper Lords of Recorded Names, each ninety million strong.
**On the Wei day at the Wei hour (1–3 PM),** it summons the Northern Dipper Lords of Fallen Death, each ninety million strong.
**On the Shen day at the Shen hour (3–5 PM),** it summons the Central Dipper Lords of the Great Culmen, each ninety million strong.
**On the You day at the You hour (5–7 PM),** it summons the Three Terraces Lords of Long Life, each ninety million strong.
**On the Xu day at the Xu hour (7–9 PM),** it summons the Twenty-Eight Constellations Lords of Disaster’s Dissolution, each ninety million strong.
**On the Hai day at the Hai hour (9–11 PM),** it summons the Thirty-Five Stars Lords of Sin’s Eradication, each ninety million strong.

**By the Supreme Primordial, the Most High, the Three Heavens, the Boundless Great Dao, the Most High Lord Lao:**
Your servant, though born of mortal flesh with dull senses and clouded perception, now presents offerings of sincerity to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Register of Lord Lao for Determining Lifespan, Extending Years, and Preserving Destiny*, to be cherished as a lifelong treasure. May the immortals and sages respond in kind. After receiving and wearing it, one must not treat the scriptures with disdain, mock Daoist priests, envy the worthy, resent the capable, bully the weak, or seize what is not rightfully theirs. Should one uphold it without transgression, it may be transmitted after ten years.

**Endorsement**
**Supervision**

chunks.original_text: 度师 太上招财镇宝妙箓 老君曰：紫微玉皇道君招财镇宝者，盖东海青童君之秘诀也 ，灵文隐秘，凡无所观，昔黄帝於太白山亲承西王母玄女奉受，乃获富贵而登仙，有玉釜仙人传流於世，自无宿福不可闻见斯文，宝箓招金召银，钱帛日增，五谷充盈，奴婢保宜，田蚕倍收，商估有利，买卖倍还，财去复来，保护家门，贼寇无伤，凶徒恶倡，慈心相向，奉受修行，家门富贵，男忠女贞，年长命远，福荫后偷，官禄日增，仕君得意，人所爱敬，出入远近，四路开通，官私敬仰，万恶不仟，龙蛇虎兽，永自潜伏，五瘟疫鬼，远进千里，斯箓宝秘，非真勿传，子能持之，深宜慎焉 。 老君曰：紫微中合招财神符，常以丙子丁丑壬寅癸卯戊申戊午满成收开，日朱书带之，招五方钱财，令人富贵，兴估万倍，买卖返还，符神九千九百九十九人侍卫人身。 老君曰：紫微中合镇宝神符，用前六富日朱书带之，男左女右，所求如意，万愿从心，钱财充足，六畜蕃息，保宜田蚕，官私敬仰，万厄不临，符神吏兵九千九百人侍卫弟子之身。 老君曰：紫微中合兴佑神符，依以六富日书而带之，兴佑觅利，所求皆得，万愿从心，常能清诤，带此神符万病不侵，钱财倍益，符神吏兵三千九百九十人保护受者之身。 太清招天库藏金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招地库藏金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招东方角姓金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招南方征姓金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招西方商姓金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招北方羽姓金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招中央宫姓金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人， 太清招九州百二十郡大富长者金银钱帛吏兵直符使者百万人。 维某年某月某日，某州县乡里，某宫观受某法箓姓某，素被新出老君太上高皇帝王神气在身，不能自分别，今赍信诣三洞法师臣某，请受太上老君招财镇宝妙箓，修行供养，以为身宝，受法之后，上不违天，下不负地，中不轻师，慢法欺孤贱寡憎老爱少，一旦违科，臧算九年，受之不犯，十年可传，一如太上老君盟科律令。 保举 监度
chunks.translated_text:
**Initiation Master: The Supreme Wondrous Register for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasure**

Lord Lao declares: The *Register of the Purple Tenuity Jade Emperor Dao Lord for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasure* is the esoteric script of the Azure Youth Lord of the Eastern Sea. Its numinous writ was once hidden, unseen by mortals, until the Yellow Emperor, on Mount Tai Bai, personally received it from the Queen Mother of the West and the Mysterious Woman. Thereby he attained wealth and nobility and ascended as an immortal. The Jade Cauldron Immortal transmitted it to the world, yet those without predestined fortune may neither hear nor behold this text. This precious register summons gold and calls forth silver, multiplying coin and silk daily. The five grains overflow, servants and maidservants thrive, fields and silkworms yield double harvests, merchants profit, and trade returns manifold. Wealth departs but returns again, safeguarding the household. Bandits and raiders inflict no harm; wicked villains and evil schemers turn toward compassion. Those who receive and cultivate it shall see their household prosper, their sons loyal and daughters chaste, their years prolonged and lives extended, their blessings shading descendants. Official emoluments increase daily, service to the sovereign brings fulfillment, and all hold them in love and reverence. Journeys near and far meet no obstruction; public and private affairs command respect. Ten thousand evils do not approach. Dragons, snakes, tigers, and beasts retreat and hide. The five pestilences and plague demons flee a thousand *li* away. This register is a treasure of secrecy—do not transmit it to the unworthy. If you can uphold it, guard it well.

Lord Lao declares: The *Purple Tenuity Central Harmony Wealth-Summoning Spirit Talisman*—regularly inscribed in cinnabar on the days of *bingzi*, *dingsi*, *renyin*, *guimao*, *wushen*, and *wuwu* (when the moon is full, waning, or waxing)—when worn, summons wealth from the five directions, bestowing riches and nobility. Trade flourishes a myriadfold, and commerce yields manifold returns. The talisman’s spirit hosts—nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine in number—attend and guard the bearer.

Lord Lao declares: The *Purple Tenuity Central Harmony Treasure-Securing Spirit Talisman*, inscribed in cinnabar on the aforementioned six prosperous days and worn—men on the left, women on the right—grants all desires as the heart wishes. Wealth and coin abound, livestock multiply, fields and silkworms thrive, and both public and private affairs command respect. Ten thousand calamities do not befall. The talisman’s spirit officers and soldiers—nine thousand nine hundred in number—attend and guard the disciple’s body.

Lord Lao declares: The *Purple Tenuity Central Harmony Prosperity-Bestowing Spirit Talisman*, inscribed on the six prosperous days and worn, brings prosperity and seeks profit, fulfilling all desires as the heart wishes. Ever pure and upright, the bearer of this spirit talisman remains untouched by the ten thousand illnesses, and wealth multiplies manifold. The talisman’s spirit officers and soldiers—three thousand nine hundred and ninety in number—protect the recipient’s body.

**The Supreme Clarity summons:**
The celestial treasury’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The terrestrial treasury’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The eastern treasury of the *Jiao* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The southern treasury of the *Zheng* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The western treasury of the *Shang* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The northern treasury of the *Yu* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The central treasury of the *Gong* surname’s gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.
The great wealthy elders of the one hundred twenty commanderies of the nine provinces—gold, silver, coin, and silk—its spirit officers, direct talisman envoys, and soldiers: one million.

On the [day] of [month] in the [year], in the [prefecture], [county], [village], and [hamlet], at the [abbey/temple], the disciple [name], bearing the newly manifested divine qi of Lord Lao, the Supreme High Emperor King, unable to discern for themselves, now presents offerings of sincerity to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Supreme Lord Lao’s Wondrous Register for Summoning Wealth and Securing Treasure*, to cultivate and venerate as a lifelong treasure. After receiving the register, one must not defy Heaven above, betray Earth below, or slight one’s master in between. One must not disdain the Dharma, bully the orphaned or weak, despise the elderly, or favor the young. Should one violate these precepts even once, their lifespan shall be reduced by nine years. If upheld without transgression, it may be transmitted after ten years. All is in accordance with the covenant and statutes of the Supreme Lord Lao.

**Endorsement**
**Supervision**

chunks.original_text: 度师 太上九一河图宝箓 维某年某月某日，某州县乡里，某宫观受某法箓姓某，素被新出老君太上高皇帝王神气在身，不能自分别，今赍信诣三洞法师臣某，请受太上九一河图元纪九皇隐讳长生不死之诀，九府灵官下卫弟子之身，却邪纳正，同会玉帝之前，一如太上老君律令。 第一阳明星玉皇九辰君，天枢星阳明之魂也，对西门上真皇夫人。 第二阴精星玉皇主华辰君，天旋星阴精之魂也，西北门上仙皇夫人。 第三真人星玉皇主仙辰君，天机星真人之魂也，对东门明皇夫人。 第四玄冥星玉皇主上飞盖君，天权星玄冥之魂也，对南门华皇夫人。 第五丹元君玉皇金魅七辰君，天断星丹元星灵也，对北门中皇夫人。 第六北极星玉皇北辰华君，北极星北极魂灵也，北极门元皇夫人。 第七天关星玉皇悲灵北盖君，摇光星天关魂，大明两门下北门虚皇夫人。 第八左辅星玉皇帝尊九辰君，洞明星辅星魂，精阳明西门帝皇夫人。 第九右弼星玉皇帝真元辰君，隐元星弼星魂精也，东南门上皇夫人。 九官取宜装 阳明大尉府九百二十品，九亿万诸灵官，飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 阴精上宰府五百五十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 真人司空府七百七十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 玄冥游击府八百八十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 丹元斗君府七百二十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 北极太常府七百七十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 天关上帝府七百七十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 辅天尊玉帝府九百二十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 弼大帝真府九百九十品，九亿万诸灵官飞龙骑吏绣衣使者，玉童玉女各九亿万人。 保举 监度
chunks.translated_text:
**Initiation Master**
*The Precious Register of the Nine-One River Chart*

On the [day] of [month] in the [year], [name], of [prefecture, county, village], having received the [name] Register at [name] Abbey, bearing the newly manifested divine qi of the Supreme High Emperor King Lord Lao within, yet unable to discern its mysteries, now presents offerings of sincerity to the Three Caverns Master, your servant [name], to receive the *Supreme Lord’s Nine-One River Chart: Primal Record of the Nine Sovereigns’ Hidden Names and the Formula for Eternal Life*. May the Nine Palaces’ numinous officials descend to guard the disciple’s body, repelling evil and embracing rectitude, to assemble together before the Jade Emperor. All is in accordance with the statutes of the Supreme Lord Lao.

**First:** The Yang Brightness Star, Jade Emperor of the Nine Celestial Lords, the hun-soul of the Celestial Pivot Star, paired with the Perfected August Consort of the Western Gate.
**Second:** The Yin Essence Star, Jade Emperor of the Flowery Celestial Lord, the hun-soul of the Celestial Rotation Star, paired with the Transcendent August Consort of the Northwest Gate.
**Third:** The Perfected Person Star, Jade Emperor of the Transcendent Celestial Lord, the hun-soul of the Celestial Mechanism Star, paired with the Radiant August Consort of the Eastern Gate.
**Fourth:** The Profound Darkness Star, Jade Emperor of the Soaring Canopy Lord, the hun-soul of the Celestial Balance Star, paired with the Flourishing August Consort of the Southern Gate.
**Fifth:** The Cinnabar Prime Lord, Jade Emperor of the Golden Spirit Seven Celestial Lords, the numinous essence of the Celestial Judgment Star, paired with the Central August Consort of the Northern Gate.
**Sixth:** The Northern Culmen Star, Jade Emperor of the Northern Culmen Flowery Lord, the hun-soul of the Northern Culmen Star, paired with the Primal August Consort of the Northern Culmen Gate.
**Seventh:** The Celestial Pass Star, Jade Emperor of the Compassionate Numinous Northern Canopy Lord, the hun-soul of the Twinkling Brilliance Star, paired with the Void August Consort beneath the Two Gates of Great Brilliance at the Northern Gate.
**Eighth:** The Left Auxiliary Star, Jade Emperor of the August Nine Celestial Lords, the hun-soul of the Luminous Cavern Star, paired with the Imperial August Consort of the Essence Yang Brightness at the Western Gate.
**Ninth:** The Right Assistant Star, Jade Emperor of the August Primal Celestial Lord, the essence-soul of the Hidden Prime Star, paired with the August Consort of the Southeastern Gate.

**Nine Palaces’ Appropriate Arrangements**
**Yang Brightness Grand Commandery:** Nine hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Yin Essence Supreme Ministry:** Five hundred fifty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.

**Profound Darkness Mobile Strike Commandery:** Eight hundred eighty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Cinnabar Prime Dipper Lord’s Palace:** Seven hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Northern Culmen Grand Constancy Palace:** Seven hundred seventy ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Celestial Pass Supreme Emperor’s Palace:** Seven hundred seventy ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Auxiliary Heavenly August Jade Emperor’s Palace:** Nine hundred twenty ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.
**Assistant Great Emperor’s Perfected Palace:** Nine hundred ninety ranks, nine hundred million myriad numinous officials, flying dragon riders, embroidered-robe messengers, jade lads and jade maidens, each numbering nine hundred million myriad.

chunks.original_text: 度师 太上百五十将军男仙灵箓 维某年某月某日，某州县乡里，某宫观受某法箓姓某，素被新出老君太上高皇帝王神气在身，不能自分别，今赍信诣三洞法师臣某，请受太上百五十将军男仙灵箓，自实悉言，被君召即日听署之后，要当扶助天师医治百姓，不得饮酒食肉，轻淫盗取，鬲戾妬。 行不正之事，自作一法，诽笑师主，此魔鬼所嫉，但当慈仁育孝，敬老爱少，父母兄弟更相承奉，常以五腊吉日於堂上祀家亲太祖，二月八月同日祠社灶，其余不得私祀他鬼神，一旦违犯，坐见中伤，不得怨道咎师，一如太上老君律令。 上仙都直使功曹十五人， 上仙都正一功曹十五人，
chunks.translated_text:
**Initiation Master**
**One Hundred Fifty Generals of the Male Immortals’ Numinous Register:**
In the such-and-such year, such-and-such month, such-and-such day, [disciple] of such-and-such prefecture, county, village, and hamlet, having received the such-and-such Dharma Register at such-and-such abbey or oratory, bearing the surname so-and-so, has long been infused with the divine qi of the Most High Lord Lao, the August High Emperor Wang. Unable to distinguish this for himself, he now presents his credentials to the Three Caverns’ Dharma Master, your servant so-and-so, to request the *Numinous Register of the One Hundred Fifty Generals of the Male Immortals*. He truthfully declares in full: once summoned by the Lord and appointed from this day forth, he must assist the Celestial Master in healing the people. He shall not drink wine, eat meat, indulge in licentiousness, steal, harbor resentment, or bear malice. He shall not engage in improper conduct, establish his own methods, or mock his master. Such are the deeds that demons and ghosts abhor. Instead, he shall cultivate kindness and nurture filial piety, respect the elderly and cherish the young, and ensure mutual support among parents and siblings. On the five auspicious days of the year and the five seasonal festivals, he shall worship his ancestral kin and the Great Ancestor in the hall. On the same days of the second and eighth months, he shall offer sacrifices to the earth gods and the hearth. He shall not privately worship other spirits or ghosts. Should he violate these precepts even once, he will suffer immediate harm, bearing no grudge against the Dao or faulting his master. All is in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Most High Lord Lao.

**Direct Envoys of the Upper Immortal Capital:** Fifteen Merit Officers.
**Orthodox Unity Merit Officers of the Upper Immortal Capital:** Fifteen.

Fourth: Refrain from deceit; do not reverse right and wrong in argument.
Fifth: Refrain from intoxication; always contemplate pure conduct.
